heineman.idiot

Class MoveCardMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • ks.common.model.Move
      • heineman.idiot.MoveCardMove

  • public class MoveCardMove
extends Move
    Action for Idiot Game: Move card from one column to another.

    SIGNATURE: MoveCard (Column from, Card moving, Column to)
    VALIDATION: to.empty()
    ACTION: to.add (moving);
    UNDO: from.add (to.get());

    Note that the from column has already been modified when the drag is present.
